175.sentence: The I-Pod is the best thing I have ever used.

179.sentence: I have transferred in about 2,400 tracks so far - very easy to use both the Ipod and iTunes.

182.sentence: I love the features on the iPod and the many things you can do with it.

184.sentence: Apple's iPod battery replacement service costs $100!

185.sentence: The arm band is fantastic and it doesn't budge even at the gym.

189.sentence: I am a big fan of iTunes, simply because it is terribly fast and convenient - IF you are buying the songs from the iTunes site.
